data.title: Toys for Tots
data.meta_description: MARINE TOYS FOR TOTS A Year-Round Force for Good Give a Child Hope Delivering hope to children at Christmastime and beyond! Through the gift of a new toy

Application Process IS NOW CLOSED for 2023

(See you next year!)

Businesses wishing to drop off toys for 2023 can contact us to setup a time for dropoff

LAKE ORION TOY PICKUP TIMES FOR FAMILIES

Thursday, December 21

3pm - 9pm

Friday, December 22

3pm - 9pm

Saturday, December 23

9am - 3pm

HOLLY LOCATION TOY PICKUPS ARE COMPLETE FOR 2023

Holly Address:

8393 E Holly Rd. Holly, MI 48442

Offices on the north side of warehouse. Offices open Monday-Friday from 10-4

Lake Orion Address:

3920 S Baldwin Rd. Orion, MI 48359

_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

This site is for Oakland County and Plymouth/Canton in NW Wayne County. For all other locations see www.toysfortots.org. Select Find Local Campaign and use the drop down menus to select Michigan and your county.

The Oakland County is divided into 4 sections. SE Oakland County, SW Oakland County & NW Wayne County, and North Oakland County. See below for the cities and coordinators for each area.

Please contact your area coordinators to donate, volunteer or apply for toys.

REGIONAL COORDINATOR: DEBRA WALLS

PHONE: 248-571-5381

EMAIL: DWALLSTOYSFORTOTS@GMAIL.COM

SE OAKLAND COUNTY

AREA COORDINATOR:CLO MCWHITE

PHONE: 248-571-5348

Serving: SOUTHFIELD, ROYAL OAK, FERNDALE, HAZEL PARK, OAK PARK, MADISON HEIGHTS, PLEASANT RIDGE, FRANKLIN, LATHRUP VILLAGE, HUNTINGTON WOODS, BERKLEY, CLAWSON, BEVERLY HILLS, BINGHAM FARMS, FRANKLIN, BIRMINGHAM, BLOOMFIELD, BLOOMFIELD HILLS

SW OAKLAND COUNTY/NW WAYNE COUNTY

PHONE : 248-571-7336

NORTH OAKLAND COUNTY
